alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wyandotte, south central Leavenworth and central Johnson Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lenexa, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Prairie Village, Merriam, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Lake Quivira, Lackmans, Holliday, Stanley and Clearview City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 213 and 227. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 7, and between mile markers 76 and 83. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 217 and 221. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
